#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        char M[501];
        int l,i;
        cin >>M;
        l=strlen(M);
        for(i=l/2-1;i>=0;i--)
            cout << M[i];
        for(i=l-1;i>=l/2;i--)
            cout <<M[i];
            cout <<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
